Articles.Content:
Hello fellow kerbonauts.

I have just made a successful mun landing, in career mode, but i now need to know what the best way is to gain science quickly and efficiently. I am up to the 4th tier of the tech tree. What should i do next?

thanks,

Toby
Minmus, or look for new and interesting biomes on the Mun, or if you think you're up for it, try a Duna mission.

Low Mun orbit, high mun orbit, different sections of the mun itself, Minmus, other planets.

You could send probes with antenna and science modules to other planet's SOI's and do experiments there and radio the results back home
When you are up for interplanetary, go to Jool. There is an enormous amount of science to be gained by just passing through the SOIs of the moons.
